post.body: Same when I was growing up.
Your parents let you watch any movie you wanted to watch? I think young children might be unable to connect with "Airheads."
Glad to hear people liked it. Let me know when's good for you and i'll give you personal training. :)
I wouldn't make it correct at all. I'm not attracted to inanimate objects.
Well, the question is just *how* correct is it.
Heh. Ironic. I wonder if they mean by "anatomically correct" what I think they mean?
Yes, probably not age-appropriate. Although I don't remember any nude scenes.
Were you on the Twitter call that I hosted today?
I recently saw "Airheads." Terrific movie. Not sure if ur daughters R old enough 2 appreciate it, or if it's age-appropriate ...
Same here - no problems when I upgraded yesterday.
fwiw, I upgraded yesterday and didn't have any trouble Hard to say whether this upgrade is any more problematic than others.
Could've been a toy or false rumor. I'm not getting worked up about it. Although that school is right in our neighborhod.
In that situation, I panic, and breathe into a paper bag until the faintness subsides.
http://tinyurl.com/2vokw5
When will we have a Nok-Hockey president?
Is there a version of the Slanket for trashy women, called the Skanket?
Hmmm.... Not sure what you mean by tweeting upcoming edcals. What did you have in mind?
I just bought a Flip. Haven't had a chance to give it a workout. The Spousal Overunit forbids me from trying it out on family.
That's how my company makes money - connecting buyers & sellers through registration req'd Internet content & live conferences.
The bad news is that two of the events I planned to attend this weekend got cancelled. That's also the good news.
Outstandingly excellent rant on Blagogate http://ff.im/-hjII
Would you buy a used plasma TV off Craigslist? Heard on the radio about a guy doing that -- seemed like odd behavior to me.

Twitter is both a conversational service *and*a channel for bulletins. That's one of the reasons that brands belong on Twitter.
